The competition series will allow contestants as young as 12 to audition, a decision Simon Cowell defended on the call after being asked if kids that young should be subjects to public scrutiny. We've started to see a trend with kids this age and what they can do. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer... times have changed. You have to make a case-by-case decision based on them as a person. Contestants will have to audition before a live audience of 5,000 people in an arena.`` It was supposed to be similar to them doing their first concert. It really helped show me who could handle

municipal bond issuers fees the organizations charge to members.`` Making taxpayers, in effect, foot the Bill Lockyer for banks' lobbying or campaign activities is not justified under any circumstances,'' said Bill Lockyer . It's improper, it will stop now, it will not happen again, and we will get our money back. I urge municipal issuers in California and other states to take the same action if they're paying these fees from bond proceeds. Bill Lockyer learned about the payments last week, and moved quickly to end the practice and recover State funds. The State started allowing underwriters to charge against bond proceeds the fees CalPSA and SIFMA assess their members

US Politics Mike Pence Paul Ryan , along with fellow Barack Obama deficit panel member Alice Rivlin , has href="http://www.house.gov/budget_republicans/Alice RivlinPaul Ryan.pdf"> put together a plan to cut the growth of government healthcare spending. This is the heart of it: A new Medicare program should be created for future retirees( those who first become eligible by turning 65 on or after Jan Schakowskyuary 1, 2021). The new Medicare program would provide a payment- based on what the average annual per-capita expenditure is in 2021- to purchase health insurance. The payment would grow annually at a rate of GDP+1 percent. The annual payment would be adjusted by income, with high-income seniors receiving a reduced payment and low-income seniors receiving extra support. The payment would also be geographically rated and adjusted for health risk. In addition to

Rumsfeld writes that military leaders supported a strike, based on what he calls extensive but not conclusive evidence that the site housed an underground facility for testing chemical weapons. He called it a fairly sizeable terrorist operation. Rumsfeld says he wanted to attack the site before Colin Powell finished his presentation in New York, because otherwise the site would be abandoned.

pain' Tuesday 25th January 2011, 8:20 AM GMT. Simon Cowell has lent his support to a Save The Children campaign Simon Cowell has finally admitted what the public have always thought- that he is a pain in the a*** . The X Factor judge couldn't resist making a joke about himself in an online video, where he gave his backing to Save The Children's new campaign, No Child Born To Die.

acquisitions MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.- Google Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt has doubled the anticipated pace of acquisitions this year and expects to maintain that rate after some internal projects have failed to spur growth. The opportunities are there, Eric Schmidt said in an interview from the company's Mountain View, Calif., headquarters last week.`` We can afford it. We're in a mode of investment for the long term.'' in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
